<a id="hardware-requirements"></a>

# Hardware Requirements

## Server Specifications

| Component | Requirement |
|-----------|------------|
| CPU       | 8 cores    |
| RAM       | 32 GB      |
| Storage   | 1 TB SSD   |

See [project schedule](basic/project-schedule.md) for timeline.
